titleStmt.title: A true and exact relation of the late prodigious earthquake & eruption of Mount Ætna, or, Monte-Gibello as it came in a letter written to His Majesty from Naples by the right Honorable the Earle of Winchilsea ... : together with a more particular narrative of the same, as it is collected out of severall relations sent from Catania / published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Winchilsea, Heneage Finch, Earl of, d. 1689.
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Wellcome Institute for the History of Medicine. Library.
